text: Ezɨ Elkana kamaghɨn an azangsɨsi, “Hana, nɨ tizim bagha azi? Nɨ tizim bagha dagheba apir puvatɨ? Egha tizim bagha navim zuraram osei? Guizbangɨra, nɨ boritam batezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ kɨ fo, nɨ bar na gifonge, nɨ ti na gizɨn otarir 10pla bateghai, nɨ mɨghɨgha me gɨnɨghnɨghan koghai, egha nɨ na isa guam dafaghai.”
